code: var colors={Low:'#FFD700',Medium:'#FF8C00',High:'#ff402c',closed:'#008000',open:'#000080',closedBg:'#e2ffe2',openBg:'#e2e2ff'};export var priorityStyles=function priorityStyles(priority){return{color:priority==='Low'?'#000':'#fff',backgroundColor:colors[priority],borderRadius:'4px',fontWeight:500,padding:'0.35em',maxWidth:'4em'};};export var statusStyles=function statusStyles(isResolved){var color=isResolved?colors.closed:colors.open;var backgroundColor=isResolved?colors.closedBg:colors.openBg;return{color:color,backgroundColor:backgroundColor,borderRadius:'4px',fontWeight:500,padding:'0.35em',maxWidth:'4em'};};
